body_html:
ImportError: libcublas.so.9.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

This means TF is looking for cuda 9.0 and failing to find.
prebuilt TF packages are built on top of cuda 9.0. To use cuda 9.2, you need to rebuild TF from sources.

body:
```
ImportError: libcublas.so.9.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
```
This means TF is looking for cuda 9.0 and failing to find.
prebuilt TF packages are built on top of cuda 9.0. To use cuda 9.2, you need to rebuild TF from sources.
